query.name: All_Proteins_In_Organism_To_Publications
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession Protein.organism.name Protein.publications.firstAuthor Protein.publications.title Protein.publications.year Protein.publications.journal Protein.publications.volume Protein.publications.pages Protein.publications.pubMedId
query.longDescription: Retrieves publications for all proteins in an organism.

constraint.value: Escherichia coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655

query.name: DomainProtGene
query.view: ProteinDomain.primaryIdentifier ProteinDomain.shortName ProteinDomain.proteins.primaryIdentifier ProteinDomain.name ProteinDomain.proteins.genes.primaryIdentifier ProteinDomain.proteins.genes.secondaryIdentifier ProteinDomain.proteins.genes.symbol ProteinDomain.proteins.genes.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: For a given protein domain (currently InterPro), returns a list of proteins containing the domain and the corresponding gene for the protein.

query.name: GOgenes
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace Gene.organism.name Gene.primaryIdentifier
query.longDescription: For a given GO annotation, returns a list of genes annotated with this GO term

query.name: GeneCoord
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: For a given gene (or list of genes) returns the location co-ordinates.

query.name: GeneGO
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace
query.longDescription: Search for GO annotations for a particular gene.

constraint.extraValue: E. coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655

query.name: GeneOrthPathw
query.view: Gene.pathways.id Gene.pathways.name Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.shortName Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.shortName Gene.homologues.evidence.evidenceCode.name Gene.homologues.homologue.pathways.identifier Gene.homologues.homologue.pathways.name Gene.homologues.homologue.pathways.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: For a given gene (or list of genes) in the named organism (default: B. sub 168) returns the pathways for the organism. Additionally, returns gene orthologues in a different organism (can be turned off to return all strains with orthologues) and the corresponding pathways. [keywords: homologue, homolog, paralogue, paralogue, ortholog, orthologue, pathway, kegg]

query.name: GenePathw
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.pathways.identifier Gene.pathways.name Gene.pathways.dataSets.name Gene.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: For a given gene (or list of genes) show any associated pathway(s) (Data Source: KEGG). Keywords: pathways, reaction, cascade

query.name: GeneProtDomain
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.organism.shortName Gene.proteins.primaryAccession Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.name Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.shortName Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.type Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.publications.pubMedId
query.longDescription: For a given gene (or list of genes) returns the proteins product (SwissProt) and InterPro domains.

constraint.extraValue: E. coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655

query.name: Gene_Orth
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.shortName Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.shortName Gene.homologues.evidence.evidenceCode.name
query.longDescription: For a given gene (or list of genes) in the named organism (default: B. sub 168) returns the orthologues in a different organisms (optional constrain is 'ON' by default and set to: B. anth A0248. Can be turned off to return all strains with orthologues). [keywords: homologue, homolog, paralogue, paralogue, ortholog]

query.name: Gene_Pathway
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.pathways.name Gene.pathways.dataSets.name Gene.pathways.identifier Gene.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: For a given gene (or list of genes) show any associated pathway(s) (Data Source: KEGG). Keywords: pathways, reaction, cascade
query.sortOrder: Gene.primaryIdentifier asc Gene.primaryIdentifier asc Gene.primaryIdentifier asc

constraint.extraValue: E. coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655

template.name: Gene_Protein
template.title: Gene --> Proteins.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_Protein
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.proteins.primaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.primaryAccession
query.longDescription: Show the proteins for a particular gene.

constraint.extraValue: E. coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655

template.name: ListPathway
template.title: Gene A --> Pathways <-- Gene B
template.comment: Under development for in-list comparisons: ML

query.name: ListPathway
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.pathways.genes.primaryIdentifier Gene.pathways.genes.symbol Gene.pathways.genes.name Gene.pathways.name Gene.pathways.identifier Gene.pathways.dataSets.name Gene.pathways.genes.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: For a given gene A (or list A of genes) show any associated pathway(s) in common with gene B (or list B of genes). Datasource: KEGG. Keywords: pathways, cascade, metabolism, reaction

query.name: OrgGene
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: For a given organism, returns a list of all genes and their chromosome locations

query.name: Organism_Protein
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession
query.longDescription: Show all the proteins from a particular organism.

constraint.description: Show all the proteins from the organism:
constraint.value: Escherichia coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655

query.name: PathwayGenes
query.view: Pathway.identifier Pathway.name Pathway.dataSets.name Pathway.dataSets.dataSource.name Pathway.genes.primaryIdentifier Pathway.genes.symbol Pathway.genes.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: For a given pathway show any genes associated with the pathway(s) in a given organism (Data Source: KEGG). [NOTE: Organism is an optional filter which is ON by default but can be turned OFF to show genes from all organisms.] Keywords: Pathway

constraint.value: E. coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655

query.name: keyProtGene
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.proteins.primaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.primaryAccession Gene.proteins.comments.description Gene.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: Find genes and proteins that are annotated with a particular term in the description. Searches UniProt comments. Optional organism filter is ON by default. Turn off to show results for all organisms. [keywords: function, keyword, text]

query.name: pubGene
query.view: Publication.firstAuthor Publication.title Publication.year Publication.journal Publication.volume Publication.pages Publication.pubMedId Publication.bioEntities.primaryIdentifier Publication.bioEntities.symbol Publication.bioEntities.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: For a given publication term (title word, or first author) returns genes associated with those publications (as curated by PubMed). [Keywords: article, publication, journal, paper, literature, gene, author]

query.name: GenePromoterExpress
query.view: Promoter.primaryIdentifier Promoter.synonym Promoter.predictedCluster Promoter.sequence.residues Promoter.gene.primaryIdentifier Promoter.gene.symbol Promoter.gene.expressionResults.meanExpr Promoter.gene.expressionResults.log2FoldChange Promoter.gene.expressionResults.CV Promoter.gene.expressionResults.condition.shortName Promoter.dataSets.name Promoter.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: For a given Bacillus subtilis gene (or list of genes) returns the promoter and expression data for conditions matching the applied filters (see below). Searches GEO data from Nicolas et al. (2012) The condition-dependent transcriptome of Bacillus subtilis 168 [PMID: 22383849; GEO: GSE27219]. Optional filters are log2 mean expression (default: ON) and log2 fold change in expression (default: OFF). Promoter sequences are derived from Nicolas et al. (2012; PMID: 22383849) and DBTBS (dbtbs.hgc.jp)
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Log2 fold-change [less than or equal to]
Log2 fold-change [greater than or equal to]

query.name: Gene2Expression
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.expressionResults.condition.name Gene.expressionResults.log2FoldChange Gene.expressionResults.meanExpr Gene.expressionResults.CV Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.organism.shortName Gene.organism.taxonId Gene.expressionResults.dataSet.name
query.longDescription: For a given gene (or list of genes) gives gene location information (Chrm:start..stop, strand) and expression data (Mean expression, log2 fold change, coefficient of variation). NOTE: So far, data are only available for B. subtilis 168 and E. coli K-12 MG1655. Selecting other organisms will return zero results.

constraint.extraValue: E. coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655

query.name: geneEggnog2Orth
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.eggNogCategories.primaryIdentifier Gene.eggNogCategories.description Gene.eggNogCategories.functionalCategories.category Gene.eggNogCategories.functionalCategories.classifier Gene.eggNogCategories.functionalCategories.name Gene.eggNogCategories.genes.primaryIdentifier Gene.eggNogCategories.genes.symbol Gene.eggNogCategories.genes.organism.shortName Gene.eggNogCategories.genes.organism.taxonId
query.longDescription: For a given gene (or list of genes) with a given EggNOG classification, returns orthologues genes annotated with the same classification.

query.name: EggNOG2Gene
query.view: EggNogCategory.primaryIdentifier EggNogCategory.description EggNogCategory.functionalCategories.name EggNogCategory.functionalCategories.classifier EggNogCategory.functionalCategories.category EggNogCategory.genes.primaryIdentifier EggNogCategory.genes.symbol EggNogCategory.genes.organism.shortName EggNogCategory.genes.organism.taxonId
query.longDescription: For a given EggNOG category, returns a list of genes (from all organisms) annotated with this category. Optional filters on COG function and Classifier, and also on Organism. [Datasource: EggNOG] Keywords: functional category, COG, function
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D and E

query.name: Gene2Enz
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.proteins.primaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.ecNumbers.identifier Gene.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: For a given gene (or list of genes) returns the protein if t is an enzyme.

template.name: geneAllProtOrg
template.title: All Genes in organism --> All Proteins in organism

query.name: geneAllProtOrg
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.proteins.primaryAccession Gene.proteins.primaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.name Gene.organism.name
query.longDescription: For a given organism, returns all protein coding genes and their proteins.

constraint.value: Escherichia coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655

query.name: path2reactGenes
query.view: Pathway.identifier Pathway.name Pathway.reactions.identifier Pathway.reactions.name Pathway.reactions.equation Pathway.reactions.modifiers.primaryIdentifier Pathway.reactions.modifiers.symbol Pathway.reactions.modifiers.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: For a given pathway (or list of pathways), returns a list of the annotated reactions and their modifiers (genes). [Datasource: KEGG]

query.name: ChromLocation_Gene
query.view: Chromosome.locatedFeatures.feature.primaryIdentifier Chromosome.locatedFeatures.feature.symbol Chromosome.primaryIdentifier Chromosome.locatedFeatures.feature.chromosomeLocation.start Chromosome.locatedFeatures.feature.chromosomeLocation.end Chromosome.locatedFeatures.feature.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: Show the genes located between two points on a chromosome. (Data Source: Entrez).

constraint.value: Escherichia coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655

query.name: Gene_OrthologueGO
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.name Gene.homologues.dataSets.name Gene.homologues.homologue.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.homologues.homologue.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code
query.longDescription: Show GO terms applied to orthologues of a specific gene. (Data Source: OrthoDB, GO Consortium).

template.name: go2genesOrg
template.title: GO term [and children] --> Genes [for one organism]

query.name: go2genesOrg
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier
query.longDescription: Find all genes that are associated with a particular GO term in a specific organism. This template will return genes that have been assigned the given GO term as well as genes that have a more specific GO term.

constraint.description: Show genes annotated with GO term (and any children of this GO term):

query.name: gene2funccat
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.eggNogCategories.primaryIdentifier Gene.eggNogCategories.description Gene.eggNogCategories.functionalCategories.category Gene.eggNogCategories.functionalCategories.classifier Gene.eggNogCategories.functionalCategories.name
query.longDescription: For a given gene (or list of genes) returns the functional classification annotated in EggNOG and COG.

template.name: BsubDifferentExpr
template.title: B. subtilis genes with differential expression [Gene(s) --> Promoter(s) + Expression ]

query.name: BsubDifferentExpr
query.view: Promoter.primaryIdentifier Promoter.synonym Promoter.predictedCluster Promoter.sequence.residues Promoter.gene.primaryIdentifier Promoter.gene.symbol Promoter.gene.expressionResults.meanExpr Promoter.gene.expressionResults.log2FoldChange Promoter.gene.expressionResults.CV Promoter.gene.expressionResults.condition.shortName Promoter.dataSets.name Promoter.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: Search for B. subtilis genes with differential expression. For a given Bacillus subtilis gene (or list of genes) returns predicted promoters (and expression data) for conditions matching the applied filters (see below). Searches GEO data from Nicolas et al. (2012) The condition-dependent transcriptome of Bacillus subtilis 168 [PMID: 22383849; GEO: GSE27219]. Optional filters are log2 mean expression (default: ON) and log2 fold change in expression (default: ON). Promoter sequences are derived from Nicolas et al. (2012; PMID: 22383849) and DBTBS (dbtbs.hgc.jp)
query.constraintLogic: A and B and (C or D)

constraint.description: Log2 fold-change [less than or equal to]
Log2 fold-change [greater than or equal to]

query.name: enz2gene
query.view: Protein.ecNumbers.identifier Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.uniprotAccession Protein.name Protein.genes.primaryIdentifier Protein.organism.name
query.longDescription: For a given enzyme EC number (default EC 2.7.7.7), returns a list of genes with proteins annotated as enzymes (Data source: UniProt). Optional to filter by organism (Default: OFF).

template.name: BsubStableExpr
template.title: B. subtilis genes with stable expression [Gene(s) --> Promoter(s) + Expression]

query.name: BsubStableExpr
query.view: Promoter.primaryIdentifier Promoter.synonym Promoter.predictedCluster Promoter.sequence.residues Promoter.gene.primaryIdentifier Promoter.gene.symbol Promoter.gene.expressionResults.meanExpr Promoter.gene.expressionResults.log2FoldChange Promoter.gene.expressionResults.CV Promoter.gene.expressionResults.condition.shortName Promoter.dataSets.name Promoter.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: Search for genes B. subtilis genes with stable expression. For a given Bacillus subtilis gene (or list of genes) returns predicted promoters (and expression data) for conditions matching the applied filters (see below). Searches GEO data from Nicolas et al. (2012) The condition-dependent transcriptome of Bacillus subtilis 168 [PMID: 22383849; GEO: GSE27219]. Optional filters are log2 mean expression (default: ON) and log2 fold change in expression (default: OFF). Promoter sequences are derived from Nicolas et al. (2012; PMID: 22383849) and DBTBS (dbtbs.hgc.jp)
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Log2 fold-change [less than or equal to]
Log2 fold-change [greater than or equal to]

query.name: gene2BacilRegNet
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.eggNogCategories.primaryIdentifier Gene.eggNogCategories.description Gene.promoters.transcriptionFactor.primaryIdentifier.symbol Gene.promoters.transcriptionFactor.primaryIdentifier.primaryIdentifier Gene.promoters.transcriptionFactor.primaryIdentifier.eggNogCategories.primaryIdentifier Gene.promoters.transcriptionFactor.primaryIdentifier.eggNogCategories.description Gene.promoters.transcriptionFactor.tfFamily Gene.promoters.transcriptionFactor.regulation Gene.promoters.sigmaBindingFactors.primaryIdentifier.primaryIdentifier Gene.promoters.sigmaBindingFactors.primaryIdentifier.symbol Gene.promoters.sigmaBindingFactors.primaryIdentifier.eggNogCategories.description Gene.promoters.sigmaBindingFactors.primaryIdentifier.eggNogCategories.primaryIdentifier Gene.promoters.evidence.publications.pubMedId Gene.promoters.sequence.residues Gene.promoters.evidence.evidenceCodes.name
query.longDescription: For a gene or groups of genes, generates gene regulation information for use by bacillus RegNet
